rows.label: qst640407_msg0002
rows.name:
I gotta do this. There's people
counting on me. I gotta go in.
...But if I go in I'll die for sure. Damn...

rows.label: qst640407_msg0003
rows.name:
I can't leave my Lee Soon an orphan...
What am I supposed to do...?

rows.label: qst640407_msg0005
rows.name: ...Sorry, what I meant is, I'm screwed.

rows.label: qst640407_msg0006
rows.name:
Never seeing my wife again actually 
might be OK, but the thought of not 
seeing my daughter has me paralyzed...

rows.label: qst640407_msg0007
rows.name:
Whuh...? You're not interested in my
family situation? Then why...?
...Ohh. You're here to help fix the plant!

rows.label: qst640407_msg0008
rows.name:
I get it now!
That's much appreciated too.

rows.label: qst640407_msg0009
rows.name:
There's a material I need for repairs
in the Pipe Maintenance Office just
ahead, called a Fused Valve.

rows.label: qst640407_msg0010
rows.name:
Amir told me to fetch three of them...
Like that was ever gonna happen, right?
That place is dangerous!

rows.label: qst640407_msg0011
rows.name: You'll do it? Are you sure...?

rows.label: qst640407_msg0101
rows.name:
There's a material I need for repairs
in the Pipe Maintenance Office just
ahead, called a Fused Valve.

rows.label: qst640407_msg0102
rows.name:
Three of them should be enough.
Thanks for taking it on!

rows.label: qst640407_msg0201
rows.name:
Well I'll be, you actually got the 
Fused Valves... Thanks so much!

rows.label: qst640407_msg0202
rows.name:
I'll take these back to the plant.
Hate to think what Amir'll say, but...
Eh, I'd better toughen up.

rows.label: qst640407_msg0203
rows.name:
Thanks to you all, I'll get to see my
daughter again! ...And also my wife...
*Gulp* OK, better think positive!
